all_settings.description: Allows the user to download or transfer a copy of their information.
Allows the user to access their information.
Allows the user to view and manage their search history.
Control what information Meta technologies can use to influence your experiences.
Control what information Meta technologies can use to influence your experiences.
Manages the user's contact information used for identity verification.
Manages the user's date of birth used for identity verification.
Settings to verify your identity and keep the community safe.
Manage your data, modify your legacy contact, deactivate or delete your accounts and profiles.
Manage your passwords, login preferences and recovery methods.
Manage your passwords, login preferences and recovery methods.

Controls the use of your connections data for advertising purposes.
Controls the use of data about companies you follow for advertising purposes.
Controls the use of your group membership data for advertising purposes.
Controls the use of your education and skills data for advertising purposes.
Controls the use of your job information for advertising purposes.
Controls the use of your employer data for advertising purposes.
Controls the use of customized display format data for advertising purposes.
Controls the use of your profile location for advertising purposes.
Controls the use of your inferred city location from your activity for advertising purposes.
Controls the use of your inferred interests and traits for advertising purposes.
Controls the use of your age range for advertising purposes.
Controls the use of your gender for advertising purposes.
Controls whether you see ads from LinkedIn on other sites and apps.
Controls whether data from third-party partners is used to show you ads.
Controls whether your data is used to measure the success of ad campaigns.

all_settings.setting: Share data with affiliates and partners
all_settings.description: Controls whether your data is shared with LinkedIn's affiliates and partners.
Navigates to a page to manage notifications related to searching for a job.
Navigates to a page to manage notifications related to hiring someone.
Navigates to a page to manage notifications related to connecting with others.
Navigates to a page to manage notifications related to network catch-up updates.
Navigates to a page to manage notifications related to posting and commenting.
Navigates to a page to manage notifications related to messaging.
Navigates to a page to manage notifications related to groups.
Navigates to a page to manage notifications related to pages.
Navigates to a page to manage notifications related to attending events.
Navigates to a page to manage notifications related to news and reports.
Navigates to a page to manage notifications related to updating your profile.
Navigates to a page to manage notifications related to verifications.
Navigates to a page to manage notifications related to games.
Navigates to a page to manage your data and activity.

all_settings.setting: Get a copy of your data
all_settings.description: Navigates to a page to download a copy of your data.
Navigates to a page to manage your search history.
Navigates to a page to manage your personal demographic information.
Controls whether your data is used for social, economic, and workplace research.
Controls whether your data is used for Generative AI improvement.
Navigates to a page to manage who can send you connection invitations.
Navigates to a page to manage invitations from your network.
Navigates to a page to manage message settings.
Controls whether you receive research invites.
Navigates to a page to manage settings for LinkedIn promotions.
Controls the Focused Inbox feature for messages.
Navigates to a page to manage read receipts and typing indicators.
Controls whether you receive messaging suggestions.
Controls whether you receive message nudges.
Controls the automated detection of harmful content in messages.
Navigates to a page to manage job application settings.

all_settings.setting: Share your profile when you click Apply for a job
all_settings.description: Controls whether your profile is shared when you apply for a job.

all_settings.setting: Signal your interest to recruiters at companies you've created job alerts for
all_settings.description: Controls whether to signal your interest to recruiters at companies for which you have created job alerts.
Navigates to a page to manage stored job applicant accounts.
Navigates to a page to manage third-party services connected to your account.
Controls the integration with Microsoft Word.
Controls how you appear to others when you view their profile.
Controls visibility when you visit a page.
Allows editing of the public-facing version of your profile.

all_settings.setting: Who can see or download your email address
all_settings.description: Controls who is able to view or download your email address.
Controls who can see your list of connections.

all_settings.setting: Who can see members you follow
all_settings.description: Controls who can see the list of members you are following.

all_settings.setting: Who can see your last name
all_settings.description: Controls who can see your full last name.
Controls whether your profile is used to represent your organizations and interests.
Controls whether page owners can export your data.

all_settings.setting: Profile discovery and visibility off LinkedIn
all_settings.description: Controls whether your profile can be discovered and viewed on services off LinkedIn (e.g., search engines).
Controls who can find your profile using your email address.
Controls who can find your profile using your phone number.
Manage the list of members you have blocked.
Controls who can see when you are active on LinkedIn.

all_settings.setting: Share job changes, education changes, and work anniversaries from profile
all_settings.description: Controls whether your network is notified about changes to your job, education, or work anniversaries.

all_settings.setting: Notify connections when you're in the news
all_settings.description: Controls whether your connections are notified when you are mentioned in news articles.
Controls whether others can mention or tag you.
Manage your followers and who can follow you.
Allow collection of additional data that helps Zoom make product improvements and provide enhanced information to help Zoom detect, diagnose, and remediate issues.
Allow hosts and participants to record the meeting to a computer. The recording will include video and shared content matching the recorder's view options, and an audio-only file.

all_settings.setting: Who can request host permission to record? - Internal meeting participants
all_settings.description: Allows internal meeting participants to request permission to record.

all_settings.setting: Who can request host permission to record? - Auto approve their permission requests (Internal)
all_settings.description: Automatically approve recording permission requests from internal meeting participants.

all_settings.setting: Who can request host permission to record? - External meeting participants
all_settings.description: Allows external meeting participants to request permission to record.

all_settings.setting: Who can request host permission to record? - Auto approve their permission requests (External)
all_settings.description: Automatically approve recording permission requests from external meeting participants.

all_settings.setting: Who can request host permission to record? - Meeting participants with specified domains
all_settings.description: Allows meeting participants with specified domains to request permission to record. This option will take precedence regardless of the two above options.
Record meetings automatically as they start
Determines for which participants a voice prompt is played when a recording starts.

all_settings.setting: Ask host to confirm before starting a recording
all_settings.description: Requires the host to confirm before a recording is started.
By default, phone users will hear one audio notification indicating that a recording has started. This enables multiple notifications.

all_settings.setting: Show international numbers link on the invitation email
all_settings.description: Show the link for Zoom International Dial-in Numbers on email invitations

all_settings.setting: Mask phone number in the participant list
all_settings.description: Phone numbers of users dialing into a meeting will be masked in the participant list.

Generate crash dumps with more information in the event of an application crash on Zoom Workplace for Windows. Those information can assist Zoom with troubleshooting issues. The dumps are not automatically shared or uploaded to Zoom.
Users can provide satisfaction scores and other preset feedback to Zoom.

all_settings.setting: Allow users to send text feedback
all_settings.description: A sub-setting of 'Feedback to Zoom' that allows users to send text feedback.

all_settings.setting: Show "Join from a room" feature on Zoom meetings in the Zoom client meeting list
all_settings.description: Users can easily start a meeting on a Zoom Room from their Zoom client.

all_settings.setting: Allow automatic direct sharing and pairing to Zoom Rooms using ultrasonic proximity signal
all_settings.description: Enable users to share their screen, start a meeting, switch a meeting in progress, open a whiteboard or send a phone call from their laptop or mobile device to Zoom Rooms, without entering a meeting ID or sharing key.

all_settings.setting: Hide potentially sensitive information on mobile task switcher
all_settings.description: By enable this option, iOS will blur the screenshot in the task switcher when multiple apps are open, and Android will hide the screenshot in the system-level recent apps list.

all_settings.setting: Change my status to away when screen saver begins
all_settings.description: While a user's presence status is in a calendar event and the computer screen saver begins, their presence status on Zoom changes to away.

When enabled, your account will have the ability to track and manage billable hours for phone calls and meetings. Users can assign client codes and add billing notes during or after a call or a meeting, and download billable hours reports directly from Contacts.

all_settings.setting: Enable manual control to start and stop billable hours tracking for calls and meetings.
all_settings.description: A sub-setting of 'Track billable hours' to manually control tracking.

all_settings.setting: Enable automatic tracking of billable hours for calls and meetings.
all_settings.description: A sub-setting of 'Track billable hours' to automatically track hours.

all_settings.setting: Show educational onboarding assistant for new features
all_settings.description: By enabling this setting, users will periodically see pop ups showing them how to set up new features in the Zoom Workplace app.

all_settings.setting: Use full display names for meeting assets generated by AI Companion
all_settings.description: By enabling this setting, you can override the display name that AI Companion detects for you with the full display name set in your profile.
Create clips that uses your user's chosen avatar to read the script they enter.
Allow users to create custom avatars for clips that would read the script they enter.
Prevents new participants from joining the meeting.
Requires the host to manually admit participants from a waiting room.
Hides the profile pictures of all participants in the meeting.
Allows participants to share their screen.
Allows participants to use the in-meeting chat.
Allows participants to change their own display name.
Allows participants to unmute their own microphones.
Allows participants to start their own video.
Allows participants to share whiteboards.
An action to immediately suspend all participant activities, such as video, audio, and sharing.
Show "Zoom Apps" button in the Zoom interface for quick access to productivity tools before, during, or after meetings.

all_settings.setting: Enable Developer Mode on mobile clients
all_settings.description: Developer Mode allows users to debug Zoom Apps using web inspector tools. Activates web inspection for new Zoom App instances.
